channel.title: Vscode on Daniel Silva's blog

item.title: Simple yet effecient VSCode shortcuts for everyday use
item.description: There’s not a (work) day that goes by where I don’t open vscode. I would even say that I spend 80% of my day on that single app. I’ve been using vscode for the last 7 years, so naturally, I’ve developed a workflow/muscle memory while using the app. Today I want to share with you some of the shortcuts that I use daily that help me be more efficient. Before we start ðŸ”—I’m using MacOS and the US keyboard layout.
